title: The Dance of the Apple Country

text_block_list.name: Staff A
text_block_list.text:
Welcome! Welcome! This is the 
"Apple Appeal Festival! End of the line is here—!
On my day off, I decided to check out an apple festival going on by myself. After all, apples are Win Variation's favorite item!
choice_data_list: (I want to find something she'd like!)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Huh, Trainer? 
Good job today. What a coincidence.
choice_data_list: Shion! Did you decide to come here too?
Shion! Did you decide to come here too?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Yup, I come here every year y'know. 
Ehehe, since I love apples, no way I was missing this.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, are you by yourself? 
Um… if you're fine with it, I can show you some of my favorite shops.

And now we're walking around together. 
As soon as we stepped into the venue, a nice smell hit my nose.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Hah… 
Ah, what an amazing smell…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
This fresh, vibrant, sweet-sour scent… hah. 
It's the greatest…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Absolutely… Ah, there's the sampling corner over there. These delightful sounds is music are my ears.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Yes… apples are, more than anything else, a precious commodity.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Of course I'm serious about it. 
I cannot disrespect the almighty apple.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: If your head's not in the game, there's no way to tell which apples are the best. Even I… have to go in with the utmost caution.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
First, let's go look at all the fresh apples. 
Ah… this is getting my heart thumping…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
A line-up of various masterpieces! 
The cross section and honey… it's dazzling…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Here's where they'll cut the apples for you right away. Trainer, what type of apples do you enjoy?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: All apples are delicious, y'know. However, they all have their own characteristics. Differences in the texture, the balance between sweet and sour…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: If you're not picky about anything, how about you try out some of my recommendations? And the first one has to be the Aomori apple!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Haaaah… it's so shiny… 
It's making my mouth water…

text_block_list.name: Staff B
text_block_list.text: We here are hard set on watching the temperature 24/7! I can guarantee you that these apples are nice, crisp and juicy～!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Totally. These apples are being raised in such a strict environment to become delicious… I'd want to try it too.
choice_data_list: This is amazing! Huh, you're not gonna eat?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Well, my stomach's already full from just looking at them… 
Inhale… exhale…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Sorry! I can't eat it just yet! 
But I trust your palette, so I'll buy some to bring back!
choice_data_list: I see, you're gonna take your time back at the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Yes, that's what I'll be doing. Well… do you mind if you try some other ones in my place?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: That looks really good too… all of the new apples this year look good. It's amazing how apples are always continuing to evolve.

Sour apples, mild apples… they were all delicious. 
Although she was still a bit stiff, she was talking and enjoying herself a lot more!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, do you want to look at some apple sweets next? 
Dishes with apples are gonna be delicious too!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Even when heated, apples don't become mushy. 
They shine when they become sweets!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
There's the standard apple pie, apple compote… 
Ah, is that caramel apple taiyaki!? It smells amazing!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: T-this… has to be eaten piping hot.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Aight… it's about time to steel my resolve! 
Now… I shall dig in…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Nom! 
I knew it, the possibilities with apples are limitless…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Man, I got a lot of sweets I gotta bring back with me… 
Right, there's a famous Aomori pie that has a whole apple inside of it.
choice_data_list: What the- you have my interest!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I definitely want you to try it! 
I wonder if it's being sold today.

After having our fill of the festival, 
we went to a nearby cafe to rest for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah～, I feel so grateful. 
Being surrounded by nothing but apples…
choice_data_list: You really like apples, don't you?
You really like apples, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I do. I like them so much that… 
I'm often asked "don't you like them too much?" and—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Wait, haven't I been doing nothing but talk your ear off all day!? I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
No, it's not fine at all. 
It was all trivial talk anyways…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: For someone who's always busy and working so hard, I shouldn't be asking you to come out and spend time like this!

That just made me remember something. 
That time when she came while I was on the phone.
From what she looked like that day… it looked like she wanted to talk about something, but she left quickly before I could ask—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
choice_data_list: You don't need to worry about that.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: But…
I wanted to know more about her hobbies and to be able to communicate with her. That's why I came here today.
choice_data_list: I wouldn't be here if I hated apples.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah… right, you're totally right!… Wait… 
Trainer, so do you like apples then?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh, why then…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Huh… 
Huh!?
I came here wanting to find out what she liked. So I told her that's why I wanted to hear even the "trivial apple talk".
choice_data_list: Of course, as long as you're fine with it…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: That's the not case at all!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, no wait… um… 
Well…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I want to talk… The truth is… 
I wanted to talk to you… the other day… about something trivial…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: —So, the "star cut" is not only easy to cut, but it's also easy to eat with the skin on.
Afterwards on the way back, we just talked about any and everything. From things relating to apples to things having nothing to do with apples.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
—Fufufu, ah… we're already back… 
Um… thank you for today.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Of course! See you tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
(It seems… I was holding back too much. 
Man, I sure do feel dumb…)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… that was a lot of fun…
